summarize: The function handles incoming POST requests with streaming data, processes the request body by replacing certain characters, and writes the modified content back to the response stream asynchronously.
The function handles incoming streamed request data, processes the data by replacing certain characters, and returns a modified result.
Processes and returns modified request body content by replacing specific characters.
The method processes streaming request data asynchronously, reading and decoding it from bytes to a string until no more data is available.
The function processes and returns the body content of an HTTP request as a UTF-8 decoded string.
